Sns.Subject: AWS Budgets: Global Cost has exceeded your alert threshold
Sns.Message:
AWS Budget Notification <Date>
AWS Account <account_id>

Dear AWS Customer,

You requested that we alert you when the <notification_type> <budget_type> associated with your <name> budget is <comparison_operator> <limit_amount> for the current <time_unit>. The <notification_type> <budget_type> associated with this budget is <value>. You can find additional details below and by accessing the AWS Budgets dashboard [1].

Budget Name: <name>
Budget Type: <budget_type>
Budgeted Amount: <limit_amount>
Alert Type: <notification_type>
Alert Threshold: <comparison_operator> <limit_amount>
ACTUAL Amount: <value>

[1] https://console.aws.amazon.com/billing/home#/budgets
